Class SkinEvent

java.lang.Object
  com.twiddles.ganesha.gui.SkinEvent
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener
class SkinEvent
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener

ActionListener to switch the GUI's look and feel.

Constructor Summary
SkinEvent(GUI window, java.lang.String skin)
          Constructs a new SkinEvent that can change the given window's skin.
 
Method Summary
 void actionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent e)
          Switches the Look and Feel to that specified to the constructor.

public SkinEvent(GUI window,

Constructs a new SkinEvent that can change the given window's skin.

Parameters:
window - the window whose LnF should be altered
skin - the classname of the Java Swing LnF to use
